name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) simultaneously to earn COMP. Flashmints are used to mint DAI from [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) to flashlend and fold the position, boosting the APY. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding

Flashmints are used to mint DAI from [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) to flashlend and fold the position, boosting the APY. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
fr.description: Fournit et emprunte {{token}} sur [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) simultanément pour gagner COMP. Les Flashmints sont utilisés pour frapper DAI de [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) à flashlend et pliez la position, augmentant l'APY. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui est redéposé dans la stratégie.

es.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
es.description: Suministra y pide prestado {{token}} en [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) simultáneamente para ganar COMP. Los Flashmints se utilizan para acuñar DAI de [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) para flashlend y doblar la posición, aumentando el APY. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se depositan nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
tr.description: COMP kazanmak için aynı anda [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) üzerinde hem {{token}} sağlar hem ödünç alır. Flashmint'ler, [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app)'dan DAI'yi basmak ve pozisyonu katlamak ve APY'yi artırmak için kullanılır. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
vi.description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) simultaneously to earn COMP. Flashmints are used to mint DAI from [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) to flashlend and fold the position, boosting the APY. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
zh.description: 在 [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) 同时存入和借出 {{token}} 赚取 COMP 奖励。Flashmint 可以被用于在 [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) 铸造 DAI，闪电贷借出，循环仓位以提升 APY。收获奖励会被换为 {{token}} 再进行复投。

hi.name: Compound Finance Flashmint Folding
hi.description: COMP कमाने के लिए {{token}} [Compound Finance](https://app.compound.finance) पर एक साथ आपूर्ति और उधार किया जाता है। फ्लैशमिंट का उपयोग [MakerDAO](https://oasis.app) से DAI को टकसाल करने के लिए किया जाता है, ताकि APY को बढ़ाकर स्थिति को फ्लैश किया जा सके और मोड़ा जा सके। अर्जित टोकन काटा जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
